page.title: 15Lace making <2>
page.content: Stella suggested that we went to a lace class at the{ Secondary School. Which was taken by a lady called Mrs Handey. The second piece of work I did was a penguin. I did this piece in black and white. The next piece I did was slightly harder, it was an owl. I went to my first lace day in March at{Wolverton. At the end of term Stella suggested that I went to her on a Monday night. After a while another girl started. A few months later two ladies, one of them already having had experience, decided to come. We were asked to{ demonstrate lace for Maids Moreton Church fete and through that someone else started. At the moment I am making a flower out of lace. By Collette Saward
